scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Version 2 includes the preliminaries and p. 2-314 (some pages are missing). This version includes some double numbering. Notes concerning pages that have been renumbered are referred to by their original number. This version corresponds roughly to Chapters 1-18 of the published first edition. Editing appears to be by Arnow and by Granville Hicks. The letters between these two is helpful [See letters in Box 31, Folder 7. When a photocopy has been provided, the original should not be used due to its delicate condition. Roman numeral chapter references were given by Arnow.
